title: Need help building fitness tracker
context: Looking for someone to build a fitness tracking app. Budget around $2-3k. Need it done ASAP.
draft:
Hi there,

I saw your post and I’m really interested in helping you build that fitness tracker. With my background in full-stack development and AI automation, I can help optimize the workflow and create an efficient solution for your needs. Let’s chat more about it to see how we can make this happen quickly.

Feel free to shoot me an email or give me a call when you get a chance. Looking forward to working with you!

Best,
Ross

title: Project inquiry - Fitness tracking dashboard
context: Email from potential client: 'I saw your work and I'm interested in building a custom fitness tracking dashboard for my gym. We have a budget of $5-7k. Can you help?' - Clear project scope, budget mentioned, aligns with your skills.
draft:
Hi [Client's Name],

I'm thrilled to hear about your interest in building a custom fitness tracking dashboard! Given my background in full-stack development and AI automation, I believe I can help you create a tailored solution that meets all of your gym’s needs. Let's schedule a quick call or chat so we can discuss the specifics and outline the best approach for this project.

Looking forward to connecting!

Best regards,
Ross Caster

title: Reply to your tweet about AI automation
context: Someone replied: 'This is exactly what I need for my business. How can I implement something like this?' - Shows clear interest in your automation skills.
draft:
Hi [Their Name],

Thanks for reaching out! I’d love to help you implement AI automation in your business. Let's chat about how we can optimize your workflows and create a custom solution that fits your needs perfectly.

Feel free to reach out via email or give me a quick call to discuss the next steps. Looking forward to working with you!

Best,
Ross
